      • captureHole

        public void captureHole​(Hole h,
                        Store playerStore,
                        boolean opposite)
        Removes all marbles from opposite hole and adds them to players store
        Parameters:
        h - hole to find opposite of
        playerStore - store to add captured marbles to
        opposite - this hole or opposite hole

      • getNextHole

        public Hole getNextHole​(Hole h)
        Returns the next Hole on the Board according to the Board layout. Used for sowing marbles.
        Parameters:
        h - current Hole
        Returns:
        next Hole on Board

        Checks if a Hole is a Store or not.
        Parameters:
        h - Hole to check
        Returns:
